title: Love Box - Asynchronous Messages
description: Love Box is an app that lets you send and view messages asynchronously. Send a loved one a sweet note, and view one from them whenever you need it. Love Box uses Three.js and has gesture based navigation, making each note feel personal and significant.

title: jFilter - jQuery filtering plugin
description: A filtering system was introduced to organize and display tickets effectively. It features a dynamic coloring system where active filter categories are highlighted in bright colors, and all active filters are shown below, organized by color for easy visibility.

title: Sneaky Chat - Anonymous Chat App
description: Sneaky Chat is a lightweight web app for anonymous chatting without requiring an account. It avoids the usual account setup hassles by allowing users to start sessions and chat publicly under random names.

title: Honkai Star Rail: Trailblaze Level Calculator
description: This tool calculates how long it will take to reach higher levels in Honkai: Star Rail, helping you gauge the time needed to earn better rewards. Before this, the only similar option was a cumbersome Google spreadsheet that didnâ€™t account for increasing EXP at higher levels.
